greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Maximum order of an element in the special linear group SL(2, Z(n)).
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
program: (GAP) Concatenation([1], List([2..15], n->Maximum(List(SL(2, Integers mod n), Order))));
MatOrder(M)={my(id=matid(#M), k=1, N=M); while(N<>id, k++;N=N*M); k}
a(n)={my(m=0); for(a=0, n-1, for(b=0, n-1, for(c=0, n-1, for(d=0, n-1, my(M=Mod([a, b; c, d], n)); if(matdet(M)==1, m=max(m, MatOrder(M))))))); m}
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Jul 06 2018
